organizations.name: RFG Alumni Council
quotes: Why do you want to serve on the RFG Alumni Council?

roles.title: member of this Council
quotes: Are you able to commit to serving as a member of this Council for one full year?

roles.title: mentor
quotes: A significant responsibility of this Council is mentoring the current fellows at each of the respective partner schools.
What ideas do you have for engaging as a mentor with the current cohort of RFG Fellows at your partner school?
Can you give an example of how you have served as a mentor, either in a formal or informal capacity, in the past?
